Constructors in libnoiseforjava.module with parameters of type ModuleBase
Add(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo)
          Noise module that outputs the additive value of the output value from two source modules.
Blend(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo, ModuleBase sourceModuleThree)
          Noise module that outputs a weighted blend of the output values from two source modules given the output value supplied by a control module.
Cached(ModuleBase sourceModule)

Curve(ModuleBase sourceModule)
           
Displace(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo, ModuleBase sourceModuleThree, ModuleBase sourceModuleFour)
          Noise module that uses three source modules to displace each coordinate of the input value before returning the output value from a source module.
Exponent(ModuleBase sourceModule)
           
Invert(ModuleBase sourceModule)
          Noise module that inverts the output value from a source module.
Max(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo)
          Noise module that outputs the larger of the two output values from two source modules.
Min(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo)
          Noise module that outputs the smaller of the two output values from two source modules.
Multiply(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo)
          Noise module that outputs the product of the two output values from two source modules.
Power(ModuleBase sourceModuleOne, ModuleBase sourceModuleTwo)
          Noise module that raises the output value from a first source module to the power of the output value from a second source module.
